data.title: List of media adaptations of Romance of the Three Kingdoms
data.meta_description: The following is a list of media adaptations of Luo Guanzhong's 14th century novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms, one of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature. The story has been adapted in numerous forms, including films, television series, manga and video games.
data.text: The following is a list of media adaptations of Luo Guanzhong's 14th century novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms, one of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature. The story has been adapted in numerous forms, including films, television series, manga and video games.
